item.title: Nancy add a quote by Sheng Wang
item.description: "Why do people say "grow some balls"? Balls are weak and sensitive. If you wanna be tough, grow a vagina. Those things can take a pounding." -- Sheng Wang

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Richelle E. Goodrich
item.description: "I shall ne'er chase rainbows again, Knowing no pot o' gold awaits at the end. My Irish treasure is not there. For ye, my love, abide with me here." -- Richelle E. Goodrich

item.title: Nancy add a quote by St. Patrick
item.description: "For that sun, which we see rising every day, rises at His command… - Greg Tobin, The Wisdom of St. Patrick from St. Patrick’s Confession" -- St. Patrick

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "I don't think God wants to be worshiped. I think the only pure worship of God is by loving one another, and I think all other forms of worship became a substitute for the love that we should show one another." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Nancy add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "I don't know the meaning of life. I don't know why we are here. I think life is full of anxieties and fears and tears. It has a lot of grief in it, and it can be very grim. And I do not want to be the one who tries to tell somebody else what life is all about. To me it's a complete mystery." -- Charles M. Schulz
